ModMetaData.name: [M.W]Multi-ToolBox
ModMetaData.author: peytonshow
ModMetaData.description: Multi-ToolBox adds 4 new melee items for all of your industrial/ultratech era needs! It's the future, surely enough you shouldn't need to use bare knuckles to chop trees or crack stone. This mod adds the Axe Pickaxe, the Hamwrench, the Work Knife and the Electrosaw. In the future, the addition of a mining drill might happen, however I'm not sure just yet.
